resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Building Arrow C++ from sources (with following flags: cmake -DARROW_PLASMA=ON  -DARROW_PYTHON=ON ..) is not possible due to some errors as shown in the attached figure.

Can someone fix them or suggest me some solution? Thanks.

comments.body:
Could you attach the full build log as text instead of screenshot?
And could you also show the full CMake command line you specified?

With CMake command:
{code:java}
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DARROW_PARQUET=ON -DARROW_PLASMA=ON -DARROW_PLASMA_JAVA_CLIENT=ON -DARROW_PYTHON=ON ..{code}
{code:java}
$ git clone https://github.com/apache/arrow.git
